name: Bnyx
description: '''Benjamin Saint Fort''' (born April 23, 1995), known professionally as '''Bnyx''' ({{IPAc-en|b|ɛ|n|iː|_|'|ɛ|k|s}}, "Benny X", stylized in [[all caps]]) is an American record producer and songwriter. He is known for extensively working with [[Yeat]] and has also produced for many artists, such as [[Drake (musician)|Drake]], [[Nicki Minaj]], [[Lil Tecca]],  [[Travis Scott]], [[YoungBoy Never Broke Again]], [[Kid Cudi]], [[Lil Uzi Vert]] and [[Trippie Redd]] among others. Bnyx is a part of the [[Philadelphia]]-founded producer collective [[Working on Dying]].
